languages.text: Один из пустотных кораблей на поле боя только что получил новый эффект! Наведите курсор на интересующий вас корабль — иконка и название эффекта отобразятся над судном. Чтобы узнать подробности о том или ином эффекте, наведете курсор на его иконку на панели {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}очередности{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Один из пустотных кораблей на поле боя только что получил новый эффект! Наведите курсор на интересующий вас корабль — иконка и название эффекта отобразятся над судном.
Чтобы узнать подробности о том или ином эффекте, наведете курсор на его иконку в очереди инициативы.

languages.text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new effect! You can hover your cursor over a ship to see the effect and its icon displayed above it.
To learn more about an effect, hover your cursor over its icon on the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel.
languages.original_text: Один из пустотных кораблей на поле боя только что получил новый эффект! Наведите курсор на интересующий вас корабль — иконка и название эффекта отобразятся над судном. Чтобы узнать подробности о том или ином эффекте, наведете курсор на его иконку на панели {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}очередности{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new effect! You can hover your cursor over a ship to see the effect and its icon displayed above it.
To learn more about an effect, hover your cursor over its icon in the initiative tracker.

One of the voidships in battle has gained a new effect! You can hover your cursor over a ship to see the effect and its icon displayed above it.
To learn more about an effect, hover your cursor over its icon in the initiative tracker.

One of the voidships in battle has gained a new effect! You can hover your cursor over a ship to see the effect and its icon displayed above it.
To learn more about an effect, hover your cursor over its icon in the initiative tracker.

One of the voidships in battle has gained a new effect! You can hover your cursor over a ship to see the effect and its icon displayed above it.
To learn more about an effect, hover your cursor over its icon in the initiative tracker.

One of the voidships in battle has gained a new effect! You can hover your cursor over a ship to see the effect and its icon displayed above it.
To learn more about an effect, hover your cursor over its icon on the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel.

languages.text:
战斗中的某艘虚空舰获得了新的效果！您可以将鼠标悬停在任意舰船上，查看舰船当前效果与上面显示的图标。
若要了解更多关于舰船效果的信息，请将鼠标悬停在{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}先攻值{/g}栏位的效果图标上。
languages.original_text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new effect! You can hover your cursor over a ship to see the effect and its icon displayed above it.
To learn more about an effect, hover your cursor over its icon on the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel.

traits.locale_text:
战斗中的某艘虚空舰获得了新的效果！您可以将鼠标悬停在任意舰船上，查看舰船当前效果与上面显示的图标。
若要了解更多关于舰船效果的信息，请将鼠标悬停在{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}先攻值{/g}栏位的效果图标上。

languages.text:
戦闘中、ヴォイドシップが新たな効果を獲得！船の上にカーソルを合わせると、表示される効果とアイコンを確認することができる。
効果の詳細を確かめるには、カーソルを{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}優先度{/g}パネルのアイコンに合わせる。
languages.original_text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new effect! You can hover your cursor over a ship to see the effect and its icon displayed above it.
To learn more about an effect, hover your cursor over its icon on the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘中、ヴォイドシップが新たな{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を獲得！船の上にカーソルを合わせると、表示される効果とアイコンを確認することができる。
効果の詳細を確かめるには、カーソルをイニシアチブ・トラッカーのアイコンに合わせる。

languages.text:
¡Una de las naves del vacío en combate ha obtenido un nuevo efecto! Mantén el cursor sobre la nave para ver el efecto y su icono sobre ella.
Para saber más sobre un efecto, mantén el cursor sobre su icono en el panel de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}prioridad{/g}.
languages.original_text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new effect! You can hover your cursor over a ship to see the effect and its icon displayed above it.
To learn more about an effect, hover your cursor over its icon on the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel.

traits.locale_text:
¡Una de las naves del vacío en combate ha obtenido un nuevo {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}! Mantén el cursor sobre la nave para ver el efecto y su icono sobre ella.
Para saber más sobre un efecto, mantén el cursor sobre su icono en el cuadro de iniciativa.

languages.text:
Eines der kämpfenden Raumschiffe hat einen neuen Effekt erhalten! Wenn du mit dem Cursor über ein Schiff fährst, werden der Effekt und sein Symbol darüber angezeigt.
Um mehr über einen Effekt zu erfahren, bewegst du deinen Cursor im {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}Priorität{/g}-Fenster über das entsprechende Symbol.
languages.original_text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new effect! You can hover your cursor over a ship to see the effect and its icon displayed above it.
To learn more about an effect, hover your cursor over its icon on the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel.

traits.locale_text:
Eines der kämpfenden Raumschiffe hat einen neuen {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} erhalten! Wenn du mit dem Mauszeiger über ein Schiff fährst, werden der Effekt und sein Symbol darüber angezeigt.
Um mehr über einen Effekt zu erfahren, bewegst du deinen Mauszeiger im Initiative-Tracker über das entsprechende Symbol.

languages.text:
L'un des vaisseaux spatiaux participant au combat a obtenu un nouvel effet ! Vous pouvez passer le curseur sur un vaisseau pour voir l'effet et l'icône affichée au-dessus.
Pour en savoir plus sur un effet, passez le curseur sur son icône dans le panneau de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priorité{/g}.
languages.original_text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new effect! You can hover your cursor over a ship to see the effect and its icon displayed above it.
To learn more about an effect, hover your cursor over its icon on the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel.

traits.locale_text:
L'un des vaisseaux spatiaux participant au combat a obtenu un nouvel {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} ! Vous pouvez passer le curseur sur un vaisseau pour voir l'effet et l'icône affichée au-dessus.
Pour en savoir plus sur un effet, passez le curseur sur son icône dans le traqueur d'initiative.

languages.text:
Çatışmadaki uçsuz gemilerinden biri yeni bir etki kazandı! İmleci bir geminin üstüne getirdiğinde, geminin üzerinde etkinin adı ve simgesi belirecektir.
Bir etki hakkında daha fazla bilgi edinmek için, imleci {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}öncelik{/g} panelindeki simgesinin üzerine getir.
languages.original_text:
One of the voidships in battle has gained a new effect! You can hover your cursor over a ship to see the effect and its icon displayed above it.
To learn more about an effect, hover your cursor over its icon on the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel.
